ttScene.ttInitScript:
tiles.initiateRelayLevel (2, 0) vars:setVar("movementSpeed", tileMovementSpeed) vars:setVar("movementSpeedTiles", tileMovementSpeed) vars:setVar("delayBetweenTiles", tileDistance) vars:setVar("timeLimit", timeLimit) vars:setVar("fullTimeLimit", timeLimit) vars:setVar("timeDecrement", 100 / timeLimit) vars:setVar("timeTotal", 100) vars:setVar("flyDistance", 3.4) vars:setVar("howManyItems", numberOfTiles) vars:setVar("howManyGlides", numberOfPowerUps * 10) vars:setVar("fadeInTime", fadeInTime) vars:setVar("fadeOutTime", fadeOutTime) vars:setVar("repeatTime", fadeOutTime + fadeInTime + 0.2) vars:setVar("slideSpeed", 0.2) vars:setVar("santaDead", 0) vars:setVar("jumpOffset", 45) vars:setVar("santaIsFlying", 0) vars:setVar("unloadLayerVar", "noLayer") vars:setVar("gameSuccessful", 0) vars:setVar("progressTotal", 0) vars:setVar("santaDrowning", 0) vars:setVar("santaIsDrowning", 0)
if (5 >= tiles.getCurrentDifficulty ()) then vars:setVar("shouldLoadPointer", "YES") end
for i = 1, numberOfTiles do vars:setVar("tile"..i.."Var", tiles.getItemX (i)) vars:setVar("posItem"..i, tiles.getItemX (i)) end for i = 1, numberOfTiles do vars:setVar("tileHelper"..i.."Var", tiles.getTwinX (i)) end
